Yonkers.Leffingwell\u2013Batcheller House: Leffingwell–Batcheller House is a historic home located at Yonkers, Westchester County, New York. It was designed by noted New York architect R. H. Robertson and built between about 1887 and 1889. It is a 2 1/2-story, masonry and frame dwelling in the Queen Anne style.
